title: Level 7 isn't high enough they need 1000 levels...
body: How many levels would you want if you could choose?

replies.body:
I'd like to at least have a Mastery 8 that requires a player to earn 4 S+ to prove their mastery and dedication to a champion.

I previously suggested that each time you earn a mastery 8 token, you only keep it in your crafting inventory for 30 days from the moment you earned it.

That way you have to consistently play your champion well over a period of time to earn a mastery higher than 7.
That's really tryhardy. Like really unfun tryhardy.
Itd be cool if it had a progressing requirement like after level 5 get 1 S and you're level 6, 2 S after that is 7, 3 S after that is 8 and so on. Even if it only went up to 10, itd be better than 7
I'd rather just flash my mastery points.
I'd of liked that but noobs reported that account to death.

i agree. it would be so awesome to flash my 1 mill mastery and then get called a no-life in all chat lmao

also that's not sarcasm
We can both be no-lifers then. {{champion:268}} - 1.9m
1000 is probably too many. I would like 1 more level (for a total of 8) for which only S+ scores granted a token. Would need a neat reward though.
Level 10 would be cool. But it should be based on number of mastery points not S scores
